relnotes.name: Software Install Device Tools
relnotes.purpose: Tools used to build swicertstore dat file and console based SWI tool.

defect.title: SMPSAFE MMP file updates for SWI and USIF

relnotes.defect: updated MMP files for SWI and USIF components to declare them SMPSAFE

defect.title: SWI text console: Incorrectly labelled option in command line help

relnotes.defect: The option to specify destination drive letter for s_help_dd_option_msg is changed to /dd at swiconsole/inc/swiconsole.l01.

deliverystep.name: Security - Alignment of CBR and System Model components

preq.title: Alignment of CBR and System Model components

deliverystep.preq: SWI Device tools are split from SWI component into a new component security_switools_device.
